page.title: 13COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {British Telecom}informed us that there are 19109 private,4709 business and 85 public telephones in the Shrewsbury area.50% of the children in our class have a telephone. Each week-day{Shrewsbury Sorting {Office}sort 200,000 2nd class letters and 260,000 1st class letters using the latest technology.Shrewsbury also receive 3,500 parcels daily posted in the area for delivery in the U.K.6,000 parcels are received daily from other Parcels Offices in the country for delivery in the Shrewsbury Area.900 Postmen are empolyed using 430 vans. {Television Channels:-BBC1,BBC2,Central and{Channel 4}may be received on a normal aerial and{BBCWales,HTV,S4C,and {Granada}on an amplified aerial. {BBC Radio 1,2,3,4,}and the successful local{Radio Shropshire}broadcasts can be received using a transistor radio.
